mainboard.name: Elspeth's Smite
mainboard.oracle_text: Elspeth's Smite deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

mainboard.name: Harm's Way
mainboard.oracle_text: The next 2 damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or permanents you control this turn is dealt to any target instead.

mainboard.name: Oust
mainboard.oracle_text: Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top. Its controller gains 3 life.

mainboard.name: Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flash
Whenever Phelia attacks, exile up to one other target nonland permanent. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If it entered under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Phelia.

mainboard.name: Wrath of God
mainboard.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

mainboard.name: Cryogen Relic
mainboard.oracle_text:
When this artifact enters or leaves the battlefield, draw a card.
{1}{U}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a stun counter on up to one target tapped creature. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

mainboard.name: Dig Through Time
mainboard.oracle_text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

mainboard.oracle_text:
Flash
When this enchantment enters, draw a card.
Creatures lose all abilities.
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice this enchantment.

mainboard.name: Mystic Confluence
mainboard.oracle_text:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.
• Draw a card.

mainboard.name: Opt
mainboard.oracle_text:
Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
Draw a card.

mainboard.name: Portent
mainboard.oracle_text:
Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order. You may have that player shuffle.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

mainboard.name: Treasure Cruise
mainboard.oracle_text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Draw three cards.

mainboard.name: Cut Down
mainboard.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with total power and toughness 5 or less.

mainboard.name: Deluge of Doom
mainboard.oracle_text: All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of card types among cards in your graveyard.

mainboard.name: Disfigure
mainboard.oracle_text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Dreadhorde Arcanist
mainboard.oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever this creature attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with mana value less than or equal to this creature's power from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

mainboard.name: Firebolt
mainboard.oracle_text:
Firebolt deals 2 damage to any target.
Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

mainboard.name: The Huntsman's Redemption
mainboard.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
II — You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a creature or basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
III — Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Tireless Tracker
mainboard.oracle_text:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.")
Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

mainboard.oracle_text:
